list.abs: ANCHOR The selection ranges from the proverbial soup to nuts . From condiments to condoms ., 主播你可以在机器上买到各种商品 , 从大众汤到坚果 , 从调味品到避孕套 , 应有尽有.
this proverbially bitter plant , wormwood ., 这是众所周知的苦味植物 , 苦艾.

" As different as chalk and cheese " is an old proverbial phrase to suggest that two things , superficially alike , are totally different in their qualities .“由于不同牛头不对马嘴”是一个古老的谚语一语表明，两件事，表面上一样，是完全不同的品质。
You can see how it a proverbial cat - and - mouse game between attackers and computer users ., 你可以看见攻击者和电脑用户之间如何变成猫和老鼠的游戏的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin proverbialis, from proverbium (see proverb)

entry.tran: 谚语的；出自谚语的；常说的
entry.def: You use pro- verbial to show that you know the way you are describing something is one that is often used or is part of a popular saying.

example.ex: The limousine sped off down the road in the proverbial cloud of dust...
example.tran: 豪华轿车沿公路飞驰而去，那真是卷起一路风尘。

example.ex: My audience certainly isn't the proverbial man in the street.
example.tran: 我的观众当然不是街上的平头百姓。

entry.def: Something that is proverbial is very well-known by a lot of people.

example.ex: His mastery of the French language was proverbial.
example.tran: 他对法语的精通是众所周知的。

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or resembling or expressed in a proverb;
